quesAndAns.question: Pseudo code to reverse a integer
What are text formatting tags? and what are various text formatting tags available?

test: Text formatting tags are used to add more meaning and visualization to the text content.
Text formatting tags are used to add more meaning and visualization to the text content.

quesAndAns.question: Given a number 'N', Calculate the no of factors of N?

Approach 1: Take min value as 1, max value as N and Iterate from 1 to N
Inside the for loop, Count the numbers which divide the N

Note: Lets Assume for 1 sec 10^8 operations are done, So If N = 10^8 It requires 1 sec for the operation. Now if N is 10^18, It will take 317 Years approx to calculate the factors, Thats why we need DSA
Approach 2: f1 * f2 = N, where f1 <= f2
Count or Find all the f1 and f2 values by iterating upto √N
Note: now the range is not 1-N, its 1-√N
